item.title: Blog Chains
item.description: Part 2 of my Creative Productivity blog chain. Start here. When I decided to reactivate this blog, I thought a lot about how to get into a habit of publishing regularly. I have collected lots of material, many notes and writing ideas, but never got to a point where I actually published anything. Overcoming perfectionism For a long time I thought of publishing on the Internet as adding to information overload by piling more stuff on top of an already gigantic pile of stuff, contributing even more to an already overcrowded space.

item.title: Writing as Thinking
item.description: Part 1 of my Creative Productivity blog chain. It crossed my mind to revive this blog with a meta post about writing. But there are too many blogs out there that haven't published anything in a long time, and the last post describes in great detail how the author plans to focus more on writing and finally publish more content on a regular schedule.
